rawtext: Hey guys, i’m 21, currently half way through army. Considering i have no outstanding loans of any sort. Is it smart to get a property, be it BTO, resale or private, as soon as i can afford it?
Would you rent out a spare room in the property you live in for extra income? Why or why not?
If I have enough to pay off my home loan, should I pay it off or use the money to invest elsewhere instead? Don't wanna have debts, but also read that it's dangerous to lock up cash in property...?
Is it a good idea to start stashing savings to pay down the cpf loan?
Hi Sam! What is your personal view of real estate (RE) as an asset class? And its expected returns moving forward? How much does physical RE make up of your own portfolio?
If you have $30,000. Three options. To put in fix deposit 7.5% p.a, buy condominium or buy a plots of land in Vietnam. Which will you do?
Can HDB apartment be use as bond if parents do not have SGD75,000 siting around? https://blog.seedly.sg/national-service-default-cost/ Thanks?
Which is a better option if my main aim is to minimise depreciation over say 10 to 15yrs - (1) a 800,000k 4rm HDB which MOP in 2019; or (2) 1.4 to 1.6mil freehold Condo?
I recently seen the I Quadrant's advertisement on Facebook where they advertised to help Singaporeans own 34 properties in 2 years with little or no money. Is it MAS approved? What are the risks?
I’m just curious, as a male in his young 20s with fulltime job paying 2-3k before cpf. Are there any ways to make use of buying and selling property in singapore to earn big bucks?
What broker should I use if I were to invest into the S&P500 (VOO) and TSLA/AAPL?
Hello (: i’m 21 years old and in university. when is the best time to start investing? i have also put some money into roboadvisors like stashaway. is that wise? how do i diversify my portfolio?
I am planning to set aside <$500 per month for investing. Considering that i am buying SWRD. Is it better to invest lump sum (quarterly) or monthly? Is IBKR or SB a better option ?

Hi I know this is a really basic question, but I’m just starting out and want to learn about investments. So, what exactly are stocks and how do people make money by trading on the stock market? TIA.?
Snowflake IPO, would you buy? I think their revenue retention rate of 158% is pretty impressive. Cloud computing and data analytics seem like the way forward as well.?
Why did all the tech stock prices fall overnight??? Are they finally starting to adjust to reflect their actual value??
Stashaway and Digiportfolio still recommended for someone who knows nothing about stocks?
What's the difference between nikko am ark distruptive innovation fund and arkk etf?
Has there ever been an overvalued/ overpriced stock that retreat to its "fair" value before?

[Endowus AMA] Hi Sam, The interest rate is zero or negative in the US and Europe. How come bonds can provide a positive return in foreseeable when interest can only go higher? Should we just be 100% equity now?
